name: Find me! for kids HD
description:
In this game, your child will have fun looking for objects hidden among many others.

With 5 grid sizes and 3 levels of difficulty, the last one with similar objects but small differences,
this game will develop the visual skills and sense of observation of your child.

Your child will also appreciate the beautiful graphics, animations and sounds.

This game is part of our education game collection "Learning is fun".
Visit our web site for more info: http://ar-entertainment.net/learning/ipad.html
